metadata.title: CVE-2022-2861 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Extensions API in Google Chrome prior to104.0.5112.101 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to inject arbitrary scripts into WebUI via a craftedHTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
